remarks: The predicate "is a commutative magma."  (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
ismgmALT.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
ismgmALT.o $e |- .o. = ( +g ` M ) $.
iscmgmALT $p |- ( M e. CMgmALT <-> ( M e. MgmALT /\ .o. comLaw B ) ) $.
